DOC.detailed_description: PROTOCOL OUTLINE : Octreotide and/or diazoxide discontinue day 1 , fast blood glucose monitor . Patients receive test meal Sustacal day 3 4 assessed insulin response . Beginning day 5 , patient give recombinant human insulin-like growth factor I subcutaneously every 12 hour total 3 dos . The first dose ( day 5 ) give 30 minute Sustacal challenge , second dose follow bedtime snack , third dose ( day 6 ) follow supervise fast .
